dwarf.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: an imaginary creature that looks like a small man
dwarf.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
dwarf.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a person who is a dwarf has not continued to grow to the normal height because of a medical condition. Many people think that this use is offensive.
dwarf.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a dwarf plant or animal is much smaller than the usual size
dwarf.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: to be so big that other things are made to seem very small
dwarf.translation[2].definitions[0].exam: The cathedral is dwarfed by the surrounding skyscrapers.
